name: Marriott Hollywood Beach

reviews.text: We celebrated our 30th Anniv. and our Daughter's graduation at the Marriott. We booked a Jr Suite through AAA and it was completely paid before we arrived for our 6 night stay.. Upon our arrival we were told by an extremely RUDE front desk employee that our Jr Suite with our ocean front balcony did not exist. She made us look at another room which had a view of the hotel back. We immediately called AAA and within seconds our Jr Suite appeared. We were told by this incompetet employee that this room is not offered to AAA members. We finally got the room we PREPAID for and it was wonderful. All the luxuries you could possibly want. Watch out for the cleaning staff! They totally forgot us one day and our room was serviced at 10:30 PM. She also seemed to ignore the coffee supply. We loved Stephanie (Concierge) she was most helpful and classy. She made up for the total ignorance and conceitedness of the Front Desk staff. At check out we got another employee who was equally as rude. We loved the pool, pool staff, waiters, waitresses. Stay away from the Front Desk and you will have a wonderful time. We have contacted AAA to thank them for their immediate help and we are in the process of filing an official complaint. Would we go back? Yes.....All the wiser!
reviews.title: Thank You AAA

reviews.text: LOVED, LOVED this hotel and will definitely come back. Staff was so friendly and helpful. Everyone had a smile on their face. Also gave great directions which is a plus. Complimentary massages and bar right by pool. Beautiful beach and wonderful weather. Beds were really comfortable. Breakfast was delicious...although a little pricey. Room service great as well. View from balconies awesome. Hot tub just right temperature. Check in and out speedy. Just great altogether. WILL DEFINITELY COME BACK!!
reviews.title: awesome staff!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I usually take a couple of beach vacations a year to places outside the US and a yearly vacation to Marthas Vineyard with family and friends. We decided to keep it simple this Spring and we headed to the Marriot in Hollywood Fl because of the good reviewes on trip advisor. We loved the beach, the board walk and the beach restaurants along the board walk.
reviews.title: loved this hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We enjoyed this vacation as much as our vacations to cancun or various islands in the carribean and elseweare and it was only a 3 hour plain flight from Boston MA. We will return soon.
reviews.title: Great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our only regret is that we only stayed at the Marriot for 3 nights. The Hotel, bath rooms, bedding, bed, balcony and staff were first class. Loved the loacation.
reviews.title: One word... heaven

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We recently stayed at this very nice property for only one night and later wished we had been there longer. When we go back to the Fort Lauderdale area, this will be number one on our list. Our room was adequate and the patio, though small, had a gorgeous view of the Ocean. The boardwalk in front of the hotel bordering the ocean was clean and very easy to navigate. Our breakfast was included in our room rate and it was a top notch buffet, including made to order omelets by a personable chef. The desk clerk made many good recommendations for dinner.
reviews.title: Beautiful View

reviews.text: Just returned from a girls "get away" weekend with my 18 yr old daughter. I considered staying at the other two Fort Lauderdale Marriott's (Harbour Beach Resort and Beach Place Towers) since I recently stayed at both of them earlier this year. Glad I selected Hollywood Beach - awesome experience. Early check in was no problem, ocean view spotless room, friendly knowledgeable staff and good eats/drinks to be had. The pool is clean and not crowded and steps from the beach so you can go back and forth! Local restaurants/taverns in walking distance on the Boardwalk which is clean and great to walk, ppl watch or bike on. The neighborhood isn't great but looks like they are working on improvements. Two malls within 10-15 minutes driving (important with a teenager!) and just a great place. I would stay here again in a heart beat!
reviews.title: Top Notch in the Area!

likes.liked: — location, ease to beach, friendly staff
likes.disliked: — Starbucks closes at 2 pm - too early!

reviews.text: I wish I had been warned. The air conditioners in this hotel are louder than tractor trailer trucks. Unless you can sleep with earplugs, forget this place. The hotel is OK, overpriced restaurant, surely nothing special. But, the area around it is awful. You over look a number of abandoned small motel/hotels. Walking the boardwalk is depressing. They act like they don't know that there is any problem with the a/c. Also, pricewise, it's high for what you get. Find another place to go. A big disappointment.
reviews.title: No way to sleep
I came back!
reviews.text: This was my second visit to the Hollywood Beach Marriott and I can say that it has improved! I liked the property the first time but they have added a few fetures that made the stay just a tad more enjoyable...the singer out by the pool on Sunday was a nice addition...the RPM (resort pool manager) made sure that the pool was under control...all very nice.

We had a oceanview suite on the end - and we like this set up as it has a king bed in the bedroom and a "sitting area" with a sofa bed. It works for our family of 4...the bathroom is very nice with marble and glass...AND I love the 2 balconys! On the side you have the pool and in front you have the ocean. We stayed here after our cruise and it was a nice way to end the trip.
reviews.title: Nice quiet place
We'll be back!
reviews.text: We took a chance on this hotel because our Ft. Lauderdale hotel (Renaissance) was just too noisy for our taste. We were very pleased with the comfortable and laid-back atmosphere, and the welcoming staff. The hotel property is lovely, our room had a view of both the Atlantic and the Intrecoastal, and the little balcony was a nice bonus. It was wonderful to open the door and feel the ocean breezes.

The paved walk in front of the hotel was a great place to get some exercise. The beach was immaculate and uncrowded, and the hotel restaurant was fairly good. It was nice to be able to eat outdoors in the morning.
reviews.title: Very Relaxing-----don't leave the hotel property!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel itself is very attractive and comfortable, but the staff is really what makes this hotel special. Next time we're going to stay longer!
reviews.title: Great Hide-away

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Hollywood Beach Marriott from Feb 8-12, 2007. The hotel is very nice and the staff always polite and accomodating. We especially liked our time at the pool each day as there were several awesome staff members who made the day relaxing and fun. The restaurant may be a little over priced but not terrible. We had a room with two double beds and it was a little cramped for three people but not enough to complain or ask for a room change. The bathroom was great.
reviews.title: Never Again

reviews.text: The one complaint about our trip is the time we spent outside the hotel property--we found people to be very rude and many acted as if we were in the way (maybe due to the many, many snowbirds who are in the area and resent "outsiders" like us there for only a short time). SO...definitely stay at the Marriott and travel outside the property with caution!! We definitely plan to return next year. It's a great place for a long relaxing weekend.
reviews.title: Such an enjoyable experience

reviews.text: We stayed (me, wife and 15 months daughter) in this hotel for the weekend. The hotel is beach front and because it is one of the biggest buildings in the area, even if you get a room on the building side, you will have an ocean-view. It is 5 minutes walking from many restaurants.
reviews.title: Great staff! good hotel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The customer service of this hotel was one of the best we have had lately. People at the front desk were very polite, helpful and always on a good mood. The staff from the restaurant and pool were very nice also.
reviews.title: VERY COOL (ding)!!!

likes.liked: — clean hotel, location, and VERY friendly staff.

reviews.text: The hotel breakfast is excellent!! we didn't have lunch neither dinner at their restaurant, what we regret of, because the food from the restaurants on the broad-walk is horrible!!
reviews.title: Loved the Hollywood Beach Marriott!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room is not very spacious, but its size is fine. We were able to fit the pack-and-play provided by the hotel without any problems. The room has a 20 some inches flat screen TV and lots of cable channels, including HBO. It was clean and the bathroom was fine. There was a small balcony with two chairs with a nice view of the ocean.
reviews.title: Perfect beachfront hotel

likes.liked: — free internet, great beach, friendly staff

reviews.text: The pool was very nice, just across from the beach.
reviews.title: Wonderful Long Weekend!

likes.liked: — the cleanliness of the rooms and great staff

description: New carpeting now in every room!Situated apart from the busy strip of tourist hotels near Fort Lauderdale, you will find a relaxing getaway at our casual, boutique-style hotel in Hollywood, Florida. Located between the Atlantic Ocean and the Intracoastal Waterway, the Hollywood Beach Marriott Hotel offers guests a dazzling South Florida oceanfront location, yet we are just an easy 6 miles from the Fort Lauderdale airport and 8 miles from Port Everglades. Featuring 229 South Floridian style guest rooms, this Hollywood beach resort boasts an array of amenities such as plush Marriott bedding, balconies and water views. Relax and enjoy a treatment at the full-service spa or bask in the sun at the beachfront pool before exploring the famous 2 ½ mile long Broadwalk and its restaurants, cafes and nightlife. From productive meetings to stunning beach weddings, this Hollywood, FL hotel can easily accommodate your meeting and event needs. We look forward to your visit to the Hollywood Beach Marriott, a AAA Four-Diamond hotel in Hollywood, Florida.
